section.title: Reading this documentation
section.para: The intention of this document is to give the user an overview of the pt_extlist extension. Its target groups are TYPO3 integrators, administrators and developers. There are individual sections for each of those groups and sections that contain information for all of them.

If you do not know what pt_extlist is doing, "What does it do?" is the chapter you should start reading. If you want to set up a first list with pt_extlist and do not know how to do that, "Examples" is the place to start.
The TypoScript reference gives you a detailed explanation of all TS settings you can use for pt_extlist.

This document was written by the developers of the second version of pt_list, Daniel Lienert and Michael Knoll. Thanks to Fabrizio Branca for the many brilliant ideas he had with pt_list version 1.0 and his steady support.
For further information about this project and some demonstrations take a look at http://extlist.punkt.de
Feel free to contact us via extlist@punkt.de if you have any further questions.
